Guido Schiller has posted a nice review article of the symbolism
of zodiac animals in Japanese art on the Sword Forum International
message board.

It is in 11 zip files (each small) which decompress to pdf files.
Well worth the few moments to download IMHO.

http://forums.swordforum.com/showthread.php?s=&threadid=33096


Rich S
